Reviews.Title: A Dream Camera For Me!
Reviews.Author: Dr. Johnson C. Philip "Author of over 100 boo...
Reviews.Content: I am a compulsive photographer, and started shooting people and objects when I was 15. A friend presented me with my first digital camera when I was 45, and life has never been the same again. That was Sony Mavica, and it used 3.5 inch floppy disks to store pictures. The highest resolution was only 1.2 mega pixels, but with its 16x optical magnification it did wonders for me.This is my fourth digital Camera in 15 years. In fact the moment I read the specification and the Sony name, I sold my non Sonly Digital Single Lens Reflex (DSLR) camera, removable lens, and telephoto lens (puchased for a futune) at a loss and bought this model. Once again, life has never been the same again after I bought it.Here are some of the features*** It offer 20+ Mega-pixel resolution, something that can do wonders*** It offer and unbelievable 50x OPTICAL magnification, again something that can do wondersCare to Take:*** The camera offers so much in terms of resolution and optical magnification that most users need to learn afresh that a powerful tool can be used in unbelievable way. Do explore all the possibilities*** Do use a monopod or a tripod for shooting at magnifications greater than 20xUniqueness:*** High resolution*** Super-high magnification*** Ability to keep the flash off in any and every situation (a manual switch is provided)*** All other standard software features are available*** Very light and ergonomic designMost Helpful Feature:*** The ability to shoot pictures even in relative darkness is the feature most helpful to me. This means that I do not have to turn the flash on at most occasions. What is more, if the image on the viewfinder screen looks dark, the circular switch at the back of the camera allows you to lighten the image before shooting to an amazing degree. This means that one can save considerable amount of battery charge, which in turn gives a longer battery life. This feature also produces better pictures than dark pictures made light in a graphics program.Recommendation:*** If ease of use, high resolution, and high optical magnification is your need, then this is THE camera for you*** It is very economically pricedI have been using this Camera now for 3 months and for me it is dream come true.

Reviews.Title: Review from a skeptical guy
Reviews.Author: Adnan V.P.
Reviews.Content: Normally, I see these "bundle" packs as a waste of time. Usually you end up paying extra for a bunch of cheap "off-brand" items that you wouldn't think to buy if you really thought about it. But... the price of this camera bundle is the EXACT same price Amazon sells it for the camera alone. I'm not going to lie, there are still some random pieces in this bundle that will be tucked away in a drawer and never see the light of day, but the following items alone are worth it:- BRAND new Sony Camera- BRAND new Sony Case (not an off-brand or cheap one)- BRAND new SONY 16GB memory card (keep in mind the camera does not come with one)- BRAND new lens cap cord (again, camera doesn't come with one)There are a bunch of other little items in the bundle that have worth, but I believe I've made my point. Its the same price as the camera alone, plus you get like $100 of extra stuff. Its a no-brainer.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: kindle queen "Jay"
Reviews.Content: Besides getting a wonderful camera, it came with all kinds of accessories for a great price.  Delivery was fast and the camera arrived safely.  As far as the camera goes, it has so many bells and whistles that I am still trying to figure out.  The only disappointment with the camera is the viewfinder.  It is not very clear, however the lcd screen is bright and clear.

Reviews.Title: The photos are sharp and so is the Zoom lens, its fantastic.  Lee Basson
Reviews.Author: Lee Basson
Reviews.Content: the camera is small enough and is not heavy and takes beautiful pictures.I still think you need a tripod when using the zoom. Lee Basson

Reviews.Title: Amazing Camera Package
Reviews.Author: Rebecca H. Miller "Mimi Jean"
Reviews.Content: The camera arrived earlier than expected which was a nice surprise.  The accessories are top notch.  The bag is wonderful and the perfect size for the camera.  You will get an array of accessories that would cost you $$ by themselves.  This package is the real deal. Now for the camera!  Goodness gracious.  I am not a beginner, but not an accomplished photographer either.  I have owned Nikon in the past and decided to try this camera based on the rave reviews.  Am I ever glad I did.  The pictures are unbelievable.  The clarity in just the point and shoot mode are incredible.  You will feel like a professional!  Play around with the other modes on the dial.  The booklet is (for once) easy to read and understand.  A monkey could use the wonderful camera!Can/order from this company--Focus Camera...they were good and for once someone reliable(!) and you will be glad.  They send you quality stuff and do not skimp.  I was fearful that I would get second rate stuff....NOT!  It is all the real deal!I cannot wait to use this camera on my upcoming trip.  Do not delay!  You will not regret it for one nano second.

Reviews.Title: Straight forward value!
Reviews.Author: J D
Reviews.Content: This will be great on our trip to the South seas!  Retired people will find it easy to operate, even with glasses.

Reviews.Title: Sony DSC HX 300 Digital camera
Reviews.Author: Judith Blair
Reviews.Content: Live in a seaside community so as soon as I received my camera  I headed out to try it.  Took pictures of ospray up in their nests on top of telephone poles, beach roses on the bush, the lighthouse surrounded by fog, boats coming into port,deer feeding on roadside.  All pictures were  all stellar quality.  I'm enjoying this camera so much.  Wish I had it sooner

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Byrhon D. Bellamy
Reviews.Content: I am no professional photographer but this camera makes me look like I am good at photography!  It is easy to use and at 20.4MP you get such great pictures and I hardly went through all the features.  My son uses it more than I do and he is ten.  I think it is a great camera.  It is definitely better than the point and click cameras out there...

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: ranchomaia
Reviews.Content: I've been using Sony H-series cameras for years. I needed an update. I bought a Sony alpha, and it is spectacular, but cumbersome to carry on long hikes, etc. I just bought the DSC HX300 and am very happy with it. It's more compact and easier to tote around all day. It's very easy to use. The Zeiss lens makes for great picture quality. I'm very glad I went with this camera.

Reviews.Title: More than I hoped for
Reviews.Author: Amy Christman "JJMom"
Reviews.Content: After doing much research in looking for a replacement for my Canon, I decided on the Sony. I am so glad that I did and that I bought the "bundle."  Not only does the camera have a ton of features, but it takes great pictures as well. I'm a mom of two kids, two dogs, a cat and a busy schedule. I don't have time to tinker and click 100 things to figure out how to get the right settings for the picture I want to take.  I still have much to figure out but in the short time I've had it, I'm in love!Now...the items in the bundle??  I paid about $20 more than I would have for the camera and got a TON of things...the SD card alone (16MB) would run over $10. The case is genuine Sony and sturdy.  The tripod is perfect for those times where you need to grab a shot with the self-timer.  And then there are other "maintenance" items that I would have never thought to purchase but will help me maintain my new investment.If you're looking to get great shots of your kids, friends, pets, events, and even experiment with new shots, this is the camera for you!

Reviews.Title: I recommend this camera- Love it
Reviews.Author: pma
Reviews.Content: I received this camera as well on Saturday and was impressed by the package of things that came with it. We went to Mt. Hood yesterday and it took great pictures of the mountain and ice in the river..Still will be learning this every day.ConsThe lens cap string is cheap and the glued part keeps coming off, my hubby is going to fix this. Sony needs to come up with a better and stronger solution for future sales.Was not clear on how to download pictures before we left for the trip, in the manual (not sufficient enough) talks about Play Memories website which I did download and then found upon our return the card reader/writer= so I used this and downloaded all the pictures- it works great- but all the previous cameras I have owned it comes with software and when you plug in it asks if you want to download- I like this way better instead of having to take the card out each timeProsLove Love Love this camera and have no regrets. I do find 30 on zoom to be blurry but have not used the tripod yet. I am going to order a extra battery for this.  I shot 220 photos and 4 videos yesterday and the battery only showed down one bar. Pleased with that.I am an amateur and if you want a point and click with a lot of options to shoot different objects this is for you.  The camera itself is very easy to learn and buttons are perfect like the video button.No regrets!!!!I don't know how to post a few pics here or I would have.

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera and zoom lens
Reviews.Author: Jimmie Dunigan
Reviews.Content: This camera will take breath taking photos and did on our trip to Cayman Islands. So easy to operate. Cannot beat the zoom lens on this camera. You should see the shots on the moon I took last night with no tripod!

Reviews.Title: Great camera with a great bundle of accessories.
Reviews.Author: BobCo21
Reviews.Content: This camera is great.  It is easy to use if you want but you can change to manual settings.  The picture quality is terrific. This camera came in a bundle with all accessories you need.

Reviews.Title: Sony DSC-HX300 camera
Reviews.Author: Janet MacLaren
Reviews.Content: I love my new camera.  The only problem I had with it was attaching the strap to the camera and the lens cap to the camera.  I had to go online because there were no instructions.  Having done that, within ONE week the thin elastic which attached the lens cap to the camera so you would not lose it came apart,and also from the tacky little sticky bit which attached to the lens cap.  I think when you pay over $400 for a well named camera you should have a better system for the lens cap.  I am going to report this to Sony too. The best price for this was certainly from Amazon and it came with lots of accessories.

Reviews.Title: BEST Deal Out There This Holiday Season!!!!!
Reviews.Author: SomeAmazonShopperOnline
Reviews.Content: Camera is Awesome for it's price. I compared it with my friends $1,000 Camera as well that he bought a year ago brand new by sony and this camera actually had more 4.5 more megapixels than his! This camera takes 3D shots and has 360 panorama and I thought it just took stills, but turns out it takes video as well!!! The only knock on this camera is that the lens doesn't seem to be removable, but with such a great one on already there isn't much to complain about. Oh....and you also get a bunch of free stuff btw.... the beauty of this camera easily makes you forget that.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Dkny1984
Reviews.Content: Love camera, takes amazing pictures, as well as videos. Easy to focus on objects a good distance away. Highly recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Camera great, flash didn't work, protection screen not good quality
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I got this camera for my wife for san valentine and it was a sad surprise when she found out that the flash wasn't working at all.We tried to call the costume service and there was no way to make the flash work.It's 7 march and i'm still waiting for another new camera for her san valentine gift. We got complete refund from amazon and that was good so we could order another new one from another seller.it's my first purchase on line with amazon for something that expensive and i'm pretty disappointed. especially because it was a gift.the camera was great, nothing to complain about, the accessories especially was pretty bad the protection screen that we tried in every way to attached. the bag it's a simple low quality bag nothing strong that's gonna protect GOOD your camera..When we took out from the box the camera there wasn't any screen protection like when you buy a new phone.. it looked to me not really new.

Reviews.Title: About the camera case.
Reviews.Author: john
Reviews.Content: The camera does not fit into the camera case. Thus the case's zipper breaks from being overstuffed. Other accessories are fine.

Reviews.Title: sony dsc-hx300
Reviews.Author: beth cecil
Reviews.Content: i was impressed with the camera I got it just in time for vacation but, when I went to use it at a low light situation the flash didn't work. I called sony they were helpful but the flash was defective. they had me send it in { part was on back order}so it took about 3 weeks to get my camera back. it does seem to be working but i'm back to work so haven't had much time to take a lot of pictures.  so I hope everything works right now.beth

Reviews.Title: great camera for point and shoot user
Reviews.Author: Kelvin Leonard
Reviews.Content: Ordered this camera for my fiance.  She needed something simple to use and produces a great picture for vacations, family visits, and etc.  This camera was the one to give her what she was looking for.  She was able to turn the camera on, start taking pictures without any problems and with great picture quality.  Does great with low lighting too!

Reviews.Title: Camera is great.
Reviews.Author: Linda Craig
Reviews.Content: This set is great. Unfortunately, the case that came with it was not! Not as depicted in picture, much too small!

Reviews.Title: Excellent Package
Reviews.Author: Richard Heck
Reviews.Content: As I wanted a Sony DSC-HX300, this package with accessories at a price = stand alone camera pricing was superb.  My products as advertised arrived quickly and I'm excited about trying out my new camera.  I had wonderful success with a Sony DSC-HX100 and I'm excited about the 50X zoom feature of this camera.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: CAN
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera for out daughter who is a buffing photographer.  Easy to use, great picture quality, zoom exceeded expectations.  Camera has plenty of advanced functions to enhance picture taking experience.  Great camera for her to grow into

Reviews.Title: Sony Camera and accessories
Reviews.Author: butch
Reviews.Content: Camera is great.The camera bag however is hardly big enough for the camera much less the charger or anything else.

Reviews.Title: Seller sent 3 different cases, none of which fit the camera
Reviews.Author: totterton
Reviews.Content: I bought this item from this seller because of the acessory pack.  I already tested out the camera at my local camera store, but chose to buy from this seller because it was such a better deal for all the things that came with it.  What I recieved is a large camcorder case (like from the 90's...for an actual camcorder), a small camera case that fits a camera half the size of the one I ordered, and an outdated smart phone case which incidentally doesn't even fit my iphone.  I am super mad about this because it seems that the seller knew that they didn't have a case to fit the camera and thought I might be pacified if I recieved 3 cases that didn't fit at all?  It just reeks of sneaky and dishonest and I am furious about the whole thing.  I have contacted them about this issue and have yet to hear back.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Justen O. Smith
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with this camera. I like the 50x optical zoom and the camera is user friendly and takes great photos. Very well made camera and I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!  Don't need to be any good at taking photos...It does all the work.
Reviews.Author: Jason Gill "Jason Gill"
Reviews.Content: Got this for my wife for Christmas.  We really like the camera.  The tripod that came with this is a joke.  It's like 8" tall.  Everything else was nice.  I'm glad we got the bundle.

Reviews.Title: I love my newest camera.
Reviews.Author: Lula L Falleaf
Reviews.Content: I have loved my camera since I got it in December.  I got a lot of comments from others that it takes really clear pictures.  I would consider telling others about this camera.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera and reasonable price.
Reviews.Author: keithcheek
Reviews.Content: Beautiful pictures with a variety of ways to set camera. Great for long range shots an close up shots as well.

Reviews.Title: Sharp images at high magnification
Reviews.Author: H Jones
Reviews.Content: I use this camera on a tripod for long distance wildlife shots.  It gives me super sharp images at 50X that meet all my expectations.

Reviews.Title: Arrived today
Reviews.Author: Cheryl Cooper
Reviews.Content: My Sony DSC-HX20.4MP Digital Camera arrived today.  I have it all assembled and it is charging.  I think I have pretty much figured out how everything works and look forward to using the effects inherent in the camera.  Somehow, it escaped me that the tripod was only a 9 inch tripod, so I have to order a good tripod for use with this camera.  The bag does not hold the camera and all the accessories, but it does hold all the accessories, and my older smaller camera will also fit into it, so I will always have them both with me.  The professional dust blower has a disagreeable odor and I have put it in a plastic zipper bag so I don't have to smell it.  The one thing I REALLY do not like is the way the lens cap attaches to the camera.  For the cost of this camera there should be a more professional way of attaching the cap. Perhaps in time, I will come to see the logic for the way it is. I did read many reviews before I bought, so I look forward to being generally pleased with this camera.  And if earlier reviews are accurate, then it should make a good camera to use for long range photographs of wildlife, and nature scenes.  It seems a good camera.  It's not perfect, but none of us are.

Reviews.Title: Really nice camera with even nicer value.
Reviews.Author: Nathaniel B. Sisson
Reviews.Content: I love the quality pictures I get from this camera. I bought this before my trip to Washington D.C. The extras from the kit was a knockout value. The carrying case is extremely nice. The camera itself is comfortable and not too heavy. The sling was kind of a joke, but I just use my carrying case whenever I am taking lots of pictures as a museum, etc.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Ann
Reviews.Content: This camera has been exactly what I was looking for.  It's easy to use and produces great photos.  The zoom is outstanding.

Reviews.Title: It had it all
Reviews.Author: Oldemill "Oldemill"
Reviews.Content: We bought this camera to take with us on a cruise.  It had everything we wanted and more, and still was not so techy that we couldn't understand how to use it or get the pictures off it.  I"m sure there are more high tech cameras out there, but we got what we wanted at a reasonable price.  What more can we say.

Reviews.Title: Great Digital Camera at a GREAT price...
Reviews.Author: Michael Stowell "Big Mike"
Reviews.Content: The 50x optical zoom is what drew my attention to this jewel....It takes fantastic photos and is easy to use.  So many presets which reduces fiddling with manual lens, aperture, shutter speeds, etc.  The accessory package is no great bonus, but some items are useful.  I didn't buy if for the extras....

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: usmc2532
Reviews.Content: Bought this to use for taking pictures of my kids playing sports, on the beach, and just playing around the yard. The ease of use of this camera is awesome, I just turn it on and start snapping pictures.  It gets a little sluggish and less responsive when the battery gets below 25% but get a couple extra batteries and you shouldn't have to worry about missing any moments.

Reviews.Title: Camera all there
Reviews.Author: Michael T. Santini
Reviews.Content: It took about an hour or so to unpack everything and assemble the camera properly. The battery charge was about 4 hours. I haven't used the camera yet, but the setup time was normal. It seems like high quality equipment for a structural perspective. Go for it....

Reviews.Title: Sony DSC-HX300 20.4MP Digital Camera with 50x Optical Zoom
Reviews.Author: Ysrrael Malca
Reviews.Content: product is excellentI get to buy timeall accessories without problemsI recommend this camera has good featureswhy I give four stars

Reviews.Title: Great Product, Great Price
Reviews.Author: R.E.A.C.H. of Macon County
Reviews.Content: Excellent, mind blowing quality camera for the price! The zoom is amazing, and crystal clear at even far away pics. Highly recommend, and is very easy to use!

Reviews.Title: Perfect camera for not professional
Reviews.Author: Eduard
Reviews.Content: Nothing what I don't like in this camera.50x Zoom working perfect and pictures I took are sharp, clear and steady.Camera combined with one of the best electronic manufacturer (Sony) and best lens manufacturer in the world (Carl Zeiss).What else do need.

Reviews.Title: Sony digital camera with 50x Zoom
Reviews.Author: Michael D. Howard
Reviews.Content: I love this camera it has a great zoom for the money it takes great pictures, is great for most of us who need a camera just a few times a year

Reviews.Title: Sony dsc-hx300
Reviews.Author: Priscilla Bruce
Reviews.Content: Great camera!  Easy to use and makes wonderful photos.  That is all I can say about it although this is prompting me to write more.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Owen S. Trappe, Jr.
Reviews.Content: my third sony. best of the bunchwould order it again. doeseverything i want it to do. would recommend it to the non professional

Reviews.Title: Glad I waited for this one.
Reviews.Author: Denise T. Cannon "WNCPixel"
Reviews.Content: Love this camera. Lightweight, easy to hold. Does so much it will take a while to figure it all out.

Reviews.Title: A great value!
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Matthews
Reviews.Content: The Camera was exactly what I wanted, with more features and options than I expected. The accessories are all items I would have had to acquire anyway, and the quality of everything is exceptional. What a great gift!

Reviews.Title: Amazing Camera
Reviews.Author: Tamara Sanchez
Reviews.Content: My best friend has this Camera and I love it soo much! It is soo clear, so I decided to buy my own.. Too bad my package was lost =(  ... I'll still rate it 5 stars because the quality of the camera is Amazing & im getting my refund. Thanks Amazon

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera
Reviews.Author: Gregory Renner
Reviews.Content: this is a very nice camera i am still learning new functions on it & i like the fact you can add filters to it,, and if interested it takes 55mm filters, the zoom on this thing is just insane,well worth the price & now Sony has a few more models this year so this one might go down in price some...all in all this was a nice package from  Focus Camera..would recommend.....

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera!!!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This camera is perfect for everything we do from pictures for our home based business to Disney World family pictures and even videos. The price was very good and the quality of product and service is excellent. Highly RecommendAAA+++

Reviews.Title: Incredible travel camera
Reviews.Author: K. O. Henderson
Reviews.Content: I purchased this just prior to a trip to Angkor Wat. It came with an abundance of accessories (many of which I have not used). It is very easy to operate and not too bulky.  The picture quality is exceptional. I had the most fun with the panoramic setting and the 3D shots.  There is also a feature that detects "smiles" and does an auto-click (interesting to see what a camera thinks a smile is).The only complaint I have is the lens cap attachment.  The adhesive was very weak and came free after a few days.  I had to apply a stronger adhesive to make sure I did not accidentally lose the lens cap in my hurry to take photos.  If you are out taking pictures all day, make sure to charge the camera overnight.  At the very least, you may consider also purchasing a portable charger.This camera provided me with the security of knowing that I was finally taking quality pictures of a fantastic location. Definitely a good value product.

Reviews.Title: too soon to tell
Reviews.Author: Lisa Wilson Krager
Reviews.Content: I have only had the camera for a few weeks and I am still working on the right setting for sports. Some of the pictures are blurry so I am working on trying different settings. I think I need more time. The camera is easy to use and the zoom is great. I bought the camera because of the zoom and the battery type, but need more time to decide if its me or the camera

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Camera
Reviews.Author: Richard Wamser
Reviews.Content: Very easy to use, The Zoom is great for close or far Pictures.  I can't believe how many Pictures ( it gives a count of those left on the display ) and how many Pictures you get on one Battery

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: L. Huffman
Reviews.Content: This camera is awesome!  Clear pics, awesome features, you can't go wrong with it!  I would highly recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Newby!
Reviews.Author: Joanne M. Boyer
Reviews.Content: This camera is great, what a  deal! I searched before buying this, can't compare to any other with all the accessories that came with it, I would recommend it to anyone!

Reviews.Title: Extended length between shots
Reviews.Author: carolyn r. stapleton
Reviews.Content: Processing/bufferIs anyone else having problems with your camera saying processing in between each shot, which causes an extreme delay. I'm using a class 10 memory card/no way to take 10 shots per second. Please help I'm perplexed.

Reviews.Title: Very good, but could permancer some items from the previous model.
Reviews.Author: Carlos
Reviews.Content: I found very good machine, but some things I preferred the previous model, as the sensor that automatically exchanged viewers when u approaching the viewer's eye or destanciava. Another detail is that the flash does not automatically rises more, also preferred the previous model. Despite these differences is machine is excellent, has a better zoom and apparently is very beautiful.

Reviews.Title: I do not regret to buy this
Reviews.Author: Lilian Golzarri Arroyo
Reviews.Content: It is an awsome camera with great features, the zoom is really amazing and the photos look incredible good. I took some picture when it start snowing and they came out awsome! Also all the things that came with the camera are really useful, I love the bag and the tripod, although I will buy one bigger but this one is good in an emergency.

Reviews.Title: Sony DSC-HX300
Reviews.Author: Daniel J. ""twice checker""
Reviews.Content: I, as the years have gone on, upgraded by buying the next very nicely advanced digital camera Sony had produced again - I am not a technical person able to explain all the details of this great camera but I'll say it allows me to do so much more now then what the first automatic cameras would do years ago - enjoy this camera as it has great quality plus it does awesome video if you want to.

Reviews.Title: Everything I wanted in a camera!
Reviews.Author: alison grindstaff
Reviews.Content: My husband bought us this camera for our 10 yr anniversary. I love to gaze at the moon and try to get pictures of it. We also like to go hiking and be outdoors a lot. This camera has such a powerful zoom, it looks as though you can reach out and touch the moon! Last night was December full moon. I got some amazing pictures of the moon rising and then more this morning of it setting!! I couldn't be happier with my camera. Focus Camera was prompt in shipping my product and it arrived when they said it would. Just in time for us to take it on our anniversary trip. We had fun playing with the different settings and taking pictures. I would totally recommend this camera to anyone who loves to shoot photographs. It has an easy mode and that is very helpful for people like me who aren't real advanced in photography. I love, love, love my camera!!! Excited about learning all of the settings inside and out.

Reviews.Title: Awesome, affordable camera kit, I am happy!
Reviews.Author: Carol Hester "kitty 47"
Reviews.Content: I read reviews of this camera on a photography blog. I consider myself an intermediate level photographer and wanted an affordable DSLR that would allow me to do more than my old Nikon would. This camera is perfect for me: I have very small hands but it is easy to hold and focus; the range of settings allows all sorts of experimentation; the 50x zoom is exactly what I wanted. My first attempt at a moon picture is awesome. For the few extra $$$$ the kit is well worth the price. I have nothing negative to say about it! After shooting a series I pop the SD card into my iPad card reader if I want to edit further, but the photos are so good I usually don't have to.The package arrived very quickly......the packaging itself was very good, nothing damaged.

Reviews.Title: Sony Camera, Etc.
Reviews.Author: Charlotte A Neill "Chan"
Reviews.Content: So far, so good.  Will need more time for real evaluation of camera itself.  But, the purchasing experience was "slick as a whistle."

Reviews.Title: hi iam happy with my new camera
Reviews.Author: Ayad
Reviews.Content: Hi every one IT IS PERFECT camera & too many staph thank Sony for this camera it is my best

Reviews.Title: Honestly a great deal...
Reviews.Author: Kenneth G. Mages
Reviews.Content: Great deal, fast delivery, 100% accurate.  Not the usual awful "stuffers" but real nice accesories.  I was pleasantly surprised!  I would absolutely order from Focus again.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic, Took My Vapor Rino photo shoot to the next level!
Reviews.Author: Vapor Rino 145PSI Steam Cleaners
Reviews.Content: So, what's the problem with this sony? Nothing! I can't find one thing I dont like about this camera. I am using it for pro photo shoots for my company's new product line Vapor Rino, a 145 psi vapor steam cleaner. Not sure how to upload photos or video but if you get to our site, you will see examples of the quality photos AND video you can take with this camera.Hands down, the best camera I have ever owned,,, period!  It is rare that I am this pleased with a product.How amazing?  Okay, check this out. I went outside one night and standing on my deck, holding the camera with only my hands I did a 50x zoom on the moon. FIRST, the amazing thing was that I was actually able to hold and keep the moon in the picture with my bare hands. Second, the pictures I got were mind blowing. I could actually see, crystal clear I might add, the crater shadows on the moon and the moon was the full size of the photo. Simply amazing. On a more practical note, the battery is amazing. I have done hours of shoots and never once ran out of juice. One problem,, my family keeps snatching up to play with :). The included 16 gig card is a real bonus and all the other accessories are just icing on the cake. I have had it a month and am 100% happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal
Reviews.Author: Mama
Reviews.Content: I ordered this camera on a Wed. and received it on that Friday. Everything was exactly as specified. On top of all that, I love the camera. Great deal all the way around.

Reviews.Title: Sony has done it again, revolutionized cameras and this is way more than just a camera
Reviews.Author: Marc H. Popek

Reviews.Title: The camera is great, the case a loser
Reviews.Author: L
Reviews.Content: I like the camera - tho I'm still trying to learn it's features it should work for the purposes it was selected for (long range photography of wildlife).  However, it is a struggle to get the camera into the case that was provided and certainly impossible to put the lens cleaning paraphernalia in as well.  I think the case was meant for a different (smaller) camera.
